er.tarun9986 wrote:
> Hi all,
> 
> I' crawling one site, that's giving me .do pages only, but i want .do.htm pages. Could you please tell me how these pages would be fetched. What setting we need to make.

Mu. [*]

Heritrix crawls all types of URLs, but it only discovers URLs to crawl 
when they are entered as 'seed' URLs, or found as outlinks after 
fetching and scanning other URLs.

If Heritrix is getting URLs that end ".do", those are the URLs it has 
been fed as seeds or has discovered.

If it is not finding desired URLs ending in ".htm", those URLs have not 
  been provided as seeds, nor discovered from elsewhere.

Note that a website is not constrained to name all pages that are HTML 
in ".htm" or ".html".

- Gordon @ IA

[*] http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mu_%28negative%29
